channel.title: Plz need help!=(
channel.description: Okay so i port forwarded my server and i know my port is open because i used a port checker and it says its open and i also put on runelocus and it says it is online. I was wondering why it wont connect to my server..Do i use a different ip such as 127.0.0.1 since i am the host? Or do i use my no-ip.org? I can't connect with my no-ip so if someone can please help me! I would greatly appreciate it!!=)

item.title: Plz need help!=(
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

Well, What i used to do is

  1. Give the other people a client with the no-ip connection.
  2. For myself, I would use as 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0

Read full topic

item.description:
